properties.name: Alexandre Silva Vaz - Calvary Chapel Rio
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasRio de Janeiro, BrasilAlexandre pastors the Calvary Chapel in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

properties.name: Brian Vanderkodde
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevassurco,peruBrain is pastoring Iglesia Cristiano Koinania, which is affiliated with Calvary Chapel and has ministries in Furrow, Carabayllo and Villa Maria near Lima, Peru. They also have beach ministries in Hermosa Beach and San Vicente Cañete.

properties.name: CCKendall
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevas16435 SW 117th Avenue, Miami, FL 33177Calvary Chapel Kendall is a body of believers desiring to know the Lord Jesus Christ, and to make Him known in an ever-increasing measure. We are a non-denominational fellowship associated with all who are of the body of Christ. We believe that the only true basis for Christian fellowship is His agape love, which is greater than any difference we possess and without which we have no right to claim ourselves Christians. (1 Corinthians 13) We believe that the marks of a maturing church are Faith, Hope, and Love. (Colossians 1:3-7) Therefore, we place a high emphasis on the teaching of God\'s Word that our Faith may grow. "So then faith comes by hearing, and hearing by the word of God." (Romans 10:17) Also, we live in anticipation of the return of Jesus, for He is our blessed Hope. "Looking for the blessed hope and glorious appearing of our great God and Savior Jesus Christ." (Titus 2:13) Finally, we desire the fullness of His Spirit in our lives, for the fruit of the Spirit is Love. By our love shall all men know we are His disciples. "But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, self-control. (Galatians 5:22-23) "By this all will know that you are My disciples, if you have love for one another." (John 13:35)

properties.name: Calvary Chapel Havana
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevashavana, cubaCalvary Chapel in Havana, Cuba

properties.name: Calvary Fellowship Ottawa
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevas5929L Jeanne D\'Arc Blvd, Orleans ON

properties.name: Carol Spears
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasBomet, KenyaCarol Spears serves as a general surgeon at Tenwek Hospital in Kenya. Her main ministry is caring for the surgical needs of Kenyan patients and sharing the love of Christ with them. Another role she has is teaching young Kenyan medical students, interns, and residents as well as short-term American medical students and residents. She is blessed, honored, and challenged to serve as a missionary surgeon at Tenwek.

properties.name: Claudia Arango
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasClaudia Arango serves with Good Shepherd\'s Fold in Uganda. Good Shepherd’s Fold was established in 1994 with the purpose and primary vision of evangelizing the orphan and destitute children of Uganda with the good news of Jesus Christ, while also providing for their physical, educational and medical needs.

properties.name: Dan Crespo
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevassan juan, puerto ricoCalvary Chapel Puerto Rico, began in July of 1998 with a handful of people meeting in a home in Caguas, PR. As they grew, they were offered the opportunity to share a building with another Christian church at 122 Condado Ave in Santurce. In October 1998 they moved to that location. After meeting for over one year in Santurce, they began looking for a new place of meeting. The Lord opened the door for them to lease a space in Los Jardines de Guaynabo shopping center. They have met there since May of 2000, and have seen the Lord bless abundantly, with several ministries being birthed to bless and help the San Juan community. Our vision for this church is simple: to know the Lord Jesus Christ and to make Him known to others (Philippians 3: 10). We believe that the Lord has raised up this ministry to primarily teach the Word of God in grace and love ("And the isles shall wait for his law" Isaiah 42:4b) and to be a spiritual hospital ("Comfort ye, comfort ye my people, saith your God" Isaiah 40: 1).

properties.name: For Zion's Sake
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevas For Zion’s Sake Ministries is a Jerusalem based non-profit, humanitarian aid organization - established and dedicated to assisting the needs of newly arriving immigrants. For most, starting over in Israel is physically and emotionally, as well as economically, overwhelming. After the slaughter of more than 6 million Jews in the Holocaust, the state of Israel was reborn miraculously in one day on May 14, 1948. God’s chosen people began returning to their ancient homeland seeking refuge.

properties.name: Frontiers
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasUnited KingdomWe support a missionary couple who have served on a Frontiers church planting team working among Muslims for the past ten years. Frontiers is an international agency works towards blessing Muslim peoples with the Gospel. In partnership with other like minded agencies, they are prayerfully working towards the goal of blessing with the Gospel all Muslim people groups in the world in the next 20 years. They are thankful to have been a part of sharing the Gospel with one unreached people group. Now God has called them to engage all Muslim peoples through a new role at Frontiers’ International Office in England . Their specific role is with the Knowledge Stewardship team. The goal of this team is to help workers in the Muslim world develop reflective skills, learn more from their experiences in order to discern what God is teaching and then identify and share these fruitful practices with other teams to increase capacity for church planting.

properties.name: Gary and Marlene Cameron
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevas11200 S.W. 8th Street, Miami, FL 33199Gary and Marlene Cameron work with Intervarsity Christian Fellowship at the Uniiversity Park and Biscayne Bay Campuses.

properties.name: George Bryson, CCCPM
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasMoscow, Russia Calvary Chapel Church Planting Mission In the summer of 1991, Chuck Smith asked Calvary Chapel pastors to prayerfully consider taking teams into the countries of the former Soviet Union (CIS) to plant churches. As a result George Bryson was asked to take a team from Calvary Chapel of Vista into Moscow, Russia to start the first Calvary Chapel of Russia. In less than two weeks, a short term mission team of 19 witnessed the birth of the first Calvary Chapel in Moscow and the beginning of what is now called Calvary Chapel Church Planting Mission. Initially CCCPM took church planting teams to Ukraine and Belarus as well as Russia but now focuses almost exclusively on Russia. God has truly opened a door for the gospel in Russia. Teams are leaving from various Calvary Chapel affiliates (as well as from what we call Calvary compatible churches) almost every month. The method and aim of this ministry is as simple as it is exciting. A group of short-term missionaries spend about ten days evangelizing the lost and discipling those that are saved from this evangelism. Another ministry team of mostly Russian nationals (now) stay behind to ensure that the newly formed church gets the pastoral and ministry care it needs to grow.

properties.name: Gospel for Asia
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasSeoul, KoreaGFA\'s mission is to be devout followers of Christ and to fulfill the Great Commission among the unreached in Asia through training, sending out and assisting qualified laborers in partnership with the Body of Christ. Their goal as a ministry is to reach the 2.7 billion people in the 10/40 Window who have never heard about the love of God. In India alone, there are over 500,000 villages with no Gospel witness. GFA trains and sends native missionaries. Native missionaries have few or no cultural barriers to overcome. They can readily share the Gospel with those who, unlike their western counterparts, have never heard. While national workers do face difficult obstacles as they take the message from village to village, they still have an enormous advantage over their coworkers from North America and other non-Asian lands. GFA currently has 54 Bible colleges where nearly 9,000 students are preparing to become full-time church planters among those who have never heard. Currently, more than 27,000 churches and mission stations have been planted by GFA native missionaries where no church existed before. On average, GFA missionaries establish approximately 15 fellowships every day in Asia among unreached villages and people groups.

properties.name: Horizonte Ministries
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasHorizonte Ministries is affiliated with Horizon Christian Fellowship and Calvary Chapel of Costa Mesa. Ministering in Mexico since 1979, Horizonte founder Juan Domingo has planted new churches and worked in evangelism throughout Mexico and Central America. Now located in Ensenada, marvelous spiritual growth and activity have occurred.

properties.name: India Connection of Koinonia Fellowship
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasPune, IndiaThe purpose of India Connection of Koinonia Fellowship is to train Indian leaders to teach the word of God.

properties.name: John Bonner
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasLima, PeruFriends of Calvary Chapel Bible College in Peru is a growing group of people in Canada and the United States who are working to help the Bible College establish an orphanage in Peru. We are supporting this mission with our prayers, our money and our work, both in our local communities and in Peru. The vision for the orphanage started with Pastor John Bonner, the Director of the Bible College, in response to a tremendous need in Peru. There are literally millions of children orphaned and homeless in Lima, Peru and surrounding areas. Pastor John’s dream is to provide a place where these children can live in safety, have opportunities to work and learn together, and ultimately to build a future for themselves and their country.

properties.name: Kim and Laura Stilwell
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasCosta RicaThe Stilwells are serving the Lord in Quepos Costa Rica. They are involved in developing a church through open street evangelism, concerts, surfer outreaches, VBS, kids clubs, youth activities, women\'s luncheons, building projects and beach Bible studies.

properties.name: Mike and Ravae Lawrence
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasPuntarenas, Costa RicaCalvary Christian Fellowship Jaco is a body of believers that has a passion to reach Jaco, Costa Rica for Christ. They offer a Sunday morning service to any who would like to come. They are also involved in various outreaches in the community throughout the year. The church runs a small Cafe in town as an outreach to meet more people in the community and tell them about the love of Jesus. They believe that by reaching people with the love of Christ, sharing the gospel of His grace, and teaching them God’s Word they will see Him bring about eternal transformation in their lives. They currently meet in the home of Pastor Mike Lawrence, located in INVU, Jaco Central. They have also partnered with a local couple in the next town over (Herradura) that has started a Sunday morning service in their community. God truly is doing great things in Jaco.

properties.name: Paul and Marcia Cawley
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasKenyaPaul and Marcia Cowley serve with Disciple Support Ministries (DSM) in Nairobi, Kenya. DSM\'s mission is to effectively train indigenous pastors to minister in their own country, establishing Bible teaching churches, Bible Schools and Children\'s Ministry programs. Paul currently focuses on pastors and people in the extensive slums of Nairobi, home to over 2,500,000 Kenyans. Paul establishes Bible schools for pastors living in the slums, and facilitates micro-loans to allow those pastors to become self-supporting. Marcia ministers to abandoned and neglected children through various Children\'s Ministry programs, orphanages and day-care projects. Paul and Marcia previously coordinated an AIDS Care Ministry in S. Florida for 5 years. Their calling as full-time missionaries was confirmed after short term missions to Ireland, Sudan, Uganda and Kenya. As DSM missionaries, Paul and Marcia focus on discipleship ministry, considering it vital to live their lives in the midst of those to whom they minister, making it a priority to meet spiritual needs with the Love of Jesus Christ.

properties.name: Phil Pechonis
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasNorth Devon, ukPhil is pastoring Calvary Chapel Woolacombe, England

properties.name: Pottersfield Ministries
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevaswhitefish, mtMichael’s ability to communicate visually with clay, combined with Pam’s musical gifts, create a living parable further illustrated by humorous stories and poignant vignettes. The ancient truths of the Bible are brought to life, making our relationship with the Master Potter a tangible reality. The Rozells are a living testimony of how God has taken two broken vessels and remade them into His design. The move of the Holy Spirit has combined Michael and Pam’s artistic and musical talents into a “one flesh” ministry. They have stepped out in faith – surrendering their worldly successes for true success: to spread the love of the Father and to encourage others to run the race set before them.

properties.name: The Rozek Family
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevas Cambridge, UKJoey, Tiffany, Madelyn (5), Josiah (3)…and one on the way!

properties.name: Wes Bentley
properties.description: Posted by GcuevassudanFar Reaching Ministries, founded by Wes Bentley, is committed to bringing long-term discipleship and systematic teaching of God\'s Word to individuals in Africa, China, Russia and other parts of the world where such teaching is either unavailable or inaccessible. Through the discipleship of indigenous leaders, teaching community Bible Studies, and planting churches and Bible Colleges FRM hopes to see native Christians receive a firm Scriptural foundation, upon which they can begin to build the ministry that God is calling them to serve in. FRM is currently serving in or partnering with ministries in China, Kenya, Russia, Sudan, Uganda, and the United States - planting churches, equipping pastors, and preparing for the future by serving and protecting children.

properties.name: Word for the World
properties.description: Posted by Gcuevas2267 W. Victoria Dr.Alpine, CA 91901Pastor Drew McIntyre began this ministry in 1986 through a vision he had been given. He has been able to travel to Cuba, Mexico, Japan, China, Central and South America, and several other countries as well, bringing Inductive Bible Study seminars to thousands of pastors and Christian workers. Pastor Drew says, “It has truly been an awesome assignment of which the Lord has allowed me to be a part. Currently more than 100 Cuban pastors are sowing the seeds of the gospel today.

properties.name: Youth Development Inc.
properties.description: Posted by GcuevasHead Waters, VA 24442The mission of YDI at Head Waters Lodge is to provide living waters to a thirsty generation, with a mission to: Win (Rescue)- Rescue today’s youth who are lost and separated from the love of Jesus. Disciple (Refresh)- Refresh in hearts a desire to follow and serve Jesus daily. Send (Restore)- Restore souls that are weary by providing a place in the wilderness for spiritual refreshing.
